body.title: The Pig's Saga
body.text: Originally released in 1993, "Kiaulės sakmė" is a conceptual album by composer Audrius Balsys and poet Romas Lileikis. The album fuses jazz, rock, folk, and sung poetry into a distinct musical narrative.
body.text2: The 2024 re-release arrives as a double vinyl with an expanded tracklist, including a special feature by Andrius Mamantovas.
